title: I have purchased pixel 2 XL on 03-02-2018 and used it for one month,it has slipped out from my hand
content: I have purchased pixel 2 XL on 03-02-2018 and used it for one month,it has slipped out from my hand and it has broken . I have been trying to get it service , but there are no such centres near me,could u pls. Suggest any help in tjis matter
